pluggable.name: SQLite Snaptshot
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Quickly create and restore snapshots of the sqlite database file.

help.value: This is a development plugin. When building plugins that interact with the database it is usefull to switch back to known states. Take and restore snapshots of the site so you can change things and revert the site to a known status. The snapshot and restore operations are done through copies of the sqlite database.db file.
